title: #Best Blitzcrank Skin Idea
body: I reckon a Scorpion (from Mortal Kombat) skin for Blitzcrank would be awesome. The whole "GET OVER HERE" thing would work perfectly! Blitz could even have the chain kunai as his Q!

replies.body: yellow jacket shen is supposed to resemble scorpion already. such a waste right, but then again it'd be hard to imagine a blitz/scorpion hybrid body composition
